title: Most valuable Italian brands in 2019
yAxis: Brand value in million U.S. dollars
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Brand, and Brand value in million U.S. dollars in each Brand on the y axis.
Brand Eni has the highest Brand value in million U.S. dollars and Poste Italiane Spa has the lowest Brand value in million U.S. dollars.
The highest Brand Eni has 7591.0 more Brand value in million U.S. dollars than the lowest Brand Poste Italiane Spa.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Brand in the x axis and Brand value in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Brand Eni has the highest Brand value in million U.S. dollars and Poste Italiane Spa has the lowest Brand value in million U.S. dollars.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Brand, and Brand value in million U.S. dollars in each Brand on the y axis.

max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Brand, and Brand value in million U.S. dollars in each Brand on the y axis.
The Brand value in million U.S. dollars is highest at Brand Eni and lowest at Brand Poste Italiane Spa.
Brand Enel has the second highest value for Brand value in million U.S. dollars.
The maximum Brand Eni has got 3.43 times higher Brand value in million U.S. dollars than the minimum Brand Poste Italiane Spa.
The Brand Eni has the highest Brand value in million U.S. dollars, followed by Enel, and Gucci. Down to the Brand Poste Italiane Spa which is the lowest.
The Brand Poste Italiane Spa has 1.48 times less Brand value in million U.S. dollars than average.
The Brand value in million U.S. dollars is 72327.0 if we add up values of all Brands.
